metadata.description:
Tales of Terror: Inspired by Tales From the Crypt, Twilight Zone, and 
Creep Show, Zenescope goes back to its roots of horror as the publisher 
known for re-inventing classics delves into an entirely new bag of 
tricks. From Poe, to Lovecraft, to brand new fables, these tales of 
terror are sure to creep you out in a whole new way!
metadata.name: Grimm Tales of Terror Vol. 1
